name: What is MVC
description: The Model-View-Controller (MVC) is an architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components: the model, the view, and the controller.

name: Introduction to Handlebars
description: Handlebars.js is a popular templating engine that is powerful, simple to use and has a large community.

name: Understanding Object-Relational Mapping
description: One of the challenges of using object-oriented programming (OOP) languages and databases is the complexity of aligning the programming code with database structures.
